channel.title: Comments on: Extra seats available for December XPages workshop

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Hi Jens,<br /><br />Glad you enjoyed it, it seems like everyone got something useful out of it.<br /><br />See you in Florida in January.<br /><br />Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
Hi Jens,

Glad you enjoyed it, it seems like everyone got something useful out of it.

See you in Florida in January.

Matt

item.title: By: Jens Polster
item.dc:creator: Jens Polster
item.description: <p>Thanks Matt, the workshop is one I wouldn't have missed. I learned a lot and had fun with you guys. What more can one expect?<br />See you at the 'sphere.<br /><img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> /></p>
item.content:encoded:
Thanks Matt, the workshop is one I wouldn’t have missed. I learned a lot and had fun with you guys. What more can one expect?
See you at the ‘sphere.
http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ />
